data: Alfred Pendray pushed himself along the corridor of the battleship Shane, holding the flashlight in one hand and using the other hand and his good leg to guide and propel himself by.
Alfred Pendray pushed himself along the corridor of the battleship _Shane_, holding the flashlight in one hand and using the other hand and his good leg to guide and propel himself by.
